title: RAK13005 WisBlock LIN Module > RAK13005 WisBlock LIN Module > Product Description > RAK13005 LIN Transceiver Module Overview
content: The RAK13005 is a **Local Interconnect Network** (LIN) transceiver module, used in automatic technologies that can be mounted on the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. It is designed for in-vehicle networks using data transmission rates from 2.4kBaud to 20kBaud, and it uses the TLE7259-3 chip from Infineon.
parent_content:
The RAK13005 is a **Local Interconnect Network** (LIN) transceiver module, used in automatic technologies that can be mounted on the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. It is designed for in-vehicle networks using data transmission rates from 2.4kBaud to 20kBaud, and it uses the TLE7259-3 chip from Infineon.  
This module offers safe communication over up to 40m distance between the LIN bus nodes. Besides the use in an automotive environment, it can be implemented in home appliances and industrial automation. The LIN bus technology consists of Peripheral (Slave) and Controller (Master) Nodes which are both supported by RAK13005.

title: RAK13005 WisBlock LIN Module > RAK13005 WisBlock LIN Module > Prerequisites > RAK13005 Module Requirements and Installation
content:
To use a **RAK13005**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to control the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK13005**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to control the module.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
